verbs.description: [ARG0: The debate over California ’s immigration laws] [V: raged] on [ARGM-LOC: in Santa Clarita] [ARGM-TMP: as the City Council formally opposed the state ’s so - called sanctuary law and filing a brief in support of the Trump administration 's lawsuit against the state] .
